#summary 职位管理
#labels free,cms,freeecms,java,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= 职位管理=
<p>
	<span style="font-style: italic; font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">FreeCMS 1.5开始支持</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">管理职位，实现招聘功能。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">1. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">职位管理</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">从左侧管理菜单点击职位管理进入。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082648_4VUa_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082648_4VUa_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">2. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">添加职位</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">在职位列表下方点击"添加"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082704_9B19_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082704_9B19_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">填写相关属性后点击"保存"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082725_7iET_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082725_7iET_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">3. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">编辑职位</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择需要编辑的职位，然后点击"编辑"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">注意:同时只能编辑一个职位。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082741_kKW7_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082741_kKW7_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082808_VPqk_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082808_VPqk_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">填写相关属性后点击"保存"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082829_rP3G_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082829_rP3G_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">4. </span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">删除职位</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">选择需要删除的职位，然后点击"删除"按钮。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">提示:同时可以删除多个职位。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082845_3Ewx_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082845_3Ewx_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082858_XIFk_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1026/082858_XIFk_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">为了防止误操作，系统会提示用户是否删除，点击"确定"完成删除操作。</span></p>
